description: It's an old habit. I spent my whole life trying not to be careless. Women and children can afford to be careless, but not men. Mr Corleone is Johnny Fontane's godfather. Now Italians regard that as a very close, a very sacred religious relationship. Very well. You want to do business with me. I will do business with you. Friends and money - oil and water. Hey, listen, I want somebody good - and I mean very good - to plant that gun. I don't want my brother coming out of that toilet with just his dick in his hands, alright?
statements: My father's name was Antonio Andolini... and this is for you. What's the matter with you? Is this what you've become, a Hollywood finocchio who cries like a woman? "Oh, what do I do? What do I do?" What is that nonsense? Ridiculous! I want your answer and the money by noon tomorrow. And one more thing. Don't you contact me again, ever. From now on, you deal with Turnbull. I am sorry. What happened to your father was business. I have much respect for your father. But your father, his thinking is old-fashioned. You must understand why I had to do that. Now let's work through where we go from here.
title: Test Suggestion 1

description: Hey, listen, I want somebody good - and I mean very good - to plant that gun. I don't want my brother coming out of that toilet with just his dick in his hands, alright? Never let anyone know what you are thinking. That's my family Kay, that's not me. I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse. My father taught me many things here - he taught me in this room. He taught me: keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
statements: I know it was you, Fredo. You broke my heart. You broke my heart! Vito, how do you like my little angel? Isn't she beautiful? I don't like violence, Tom. I'm a businessman; blood is a big expense. In Sicily, women are more dangerous than shotguns. If anything in this life is certain, if history has taught us anything, it is that you can kill anyone.
title: Test Suggestion 2
